name: Double Banana Nut Bread
author: Athena E
summary: A very moist and dense banana nut bread that will have your brunch guests begging for the recipe. This recipe works well for low and high altitudes without making any adjustments.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour two 9x5-inch loaf pans
Beat vegetable oil and sugar together in a bowl until creamy and smooth; stir in eggs
Mash bananas and lemon juice together in a separate bowl; mix into oil mixture until just incorporated
Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together in a third bowl; slowly mix into wet mixture using an electric mixer on low until just incorporated
Pour batter into the two prepared loaf pans
Bake in the preheated oven until a knife inserted in the center of the loaf comes out clean, about 1 hour 15 minutes
